outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>today for breakfast you will have oatmeal, for lunch you will have meatloaf with gravy and a baked potato, and for dinner you will have half of a peanut butter and jelly sandwich</speak>

card.title: Meal Mate
card.content: today for breakfast you will have oatmeal, for lunch you will have meatloaf with gravy and a baked potato, and for dinner you will have half of a peanut butter and jelly sandwich
